[Cube #187 Report Log] 
 WARNING: Inordinate power fluctuations detected in port nacelle. 
Attempting to reroute system power and vent plasma…
ERROR: Interior sensors detect major hull breach and loss of primary power systems. Reactor breach is imminent!
 Initializing emergency core isolation and ejection sequence… 
 RUNTIME ERROR {E.1337}: Emergency core isolation and ejection sequence failed to complete. 
Critical System failure is imminent… 
 Transmitting operational data to primary Unimatrix.
Link established…
SYSTEM ERROR: Unimatrix Link is unstable, data corruption detected… 
 [/Cube #187 Report Log End>
…
{Emergency protocols activated}
[Emergency Log]\Attempting to reestablish connection with primary unimatrix…
-Attempt failed.
Assessing system damage… 
System unresponsive, catastrophic fail detected.
Surveying viable nanites, drones, and support systems: {- 3/58 Drones online - primary nanite substrate system offline – resources detected in immediate area -}
Analyzing system logs to form contingency operation sequence…
…
…
Analysis complete.
Primary Unimatrix assumed to be destroyed. Establish new unimatrix and continue primary objective of universal assimilation.
Secure Nanite substrate from local sources.
 Achieve orbit and rebuild a warp-capable Cube. 
Assimilate viable organisms to add their biological and technological distinctiveness to our own.
We are Borg…
